title: Hospital flu cases drop as NHS on cold weather alert
description: NHS bosses say the fall is welcome, but expect freezing temperatures to increase pressure on the health service.
content:
Nick TriggleHealth correspondent
The number of patients in hospital with flu has fallen in England, but NHS bosses are warning the cold snap could increase the pressure on the health service in the … [+2303 chars]

en: Hospital flu cases drop as NHS on cold weather alert. NHS bosses say the fall is welcome, but expect freezing temperatures to increase pressure on the health service.
la: Hospitium flu casuum stillant sicut NHS in tempestate frigoris intenti. NHS bullae dicunt casum gratissimum esse, sed expectes torpore temperaturas ut pressuram augeant in servitio sanitatis.

title: Florida cold snap sends iguanas tumbling from trees on New Year’s Eve
description: A sharp cold snap sent temperatures plunging across the state, stunning cold-blooded iguanas and knocking them from trees in South Florida.
content:
Florida rang in the New Year under an Arctic chill and the cold delivered one of the Sunshine States strangest spectacles: iguanas falling from the sky.
A sharp cold snap sent temperatures plunging … [+3563 chars]
de: Der Kälteeinbruch in Florida lässt Leguane am Silvesterabend von Bäumen fallen. Ein heftiger Kälteeinbruch ließ die Temperaturen im ganzen Staat sinken, was kaltblütige Leguane betäubte und sie von Bäumen in Südflorida warf.
en: Florida cold snap sends iguanas tumbling from trees on New Year’s Eve. A sharp cold snap sent temperatures plunging across the state, stunning cold-blooded iguanas and knocking them from trees in South Florida.

title: Climate change shifts the North Pacific storm track polewards
description: An observation-based storm-track proxy shows that the winter North Pacific storm track has shifted substantially polewards, suggesting regional impacts on precipitation and warming patterns, with implications for temperature variability and extreme events.
content:
<li>Salathe, E. P. Influences of a shift in North Pacific storm tracks on western North American precipitation under global warming. Geophys. Res. Lett.33, L19820 (2006).
Article 
 ADS 
Google Sch… [+11717 chars]
de: Der Klimawandel verschiebt die Sturmbahn im Nordpazifik polwärts. Ein beobachtungsbasierter Sturmbahn-Proxy zeigt, dass sich die Sturmbahn im Winter im Nordpazifik erheblich polwärts verschoben hat, was auf regionale Auswirkungen auf Niederschlags- und Erwärmungsmuster mit Auswirkungen auf Temperaturschwankungen und Extremereignisse schließen lässt.
en: Climate change shifts the North Pacific storm track polewards. An observation-based storm-track proxy shows that the winter North Pacific storm track has shifted substantially polewards, suggesting regional impacts on precipitation and warming patterns, with implications for temperature variability and extreme events.
la: Clima mutationis aquilonis Pacifici turbinis vestigia polos variat. title: School holds lessons in cold classrooms after heating breakdown
description: Classes at Gryffe High in Houston are claimed to have taken place in temperatures below health and safety guidelines.
content:
Pupils in a Renfrewshire school have been taught in cold classrooms after the building's heating broke down.
Classes at Gryffe High in Houston are claimed to have taken place with temperatures under… [+2483 chars]
de: Nach einem Heizungsausfall findet der Unterricht in der Schule in kalten Klassenräumen statt. Der Unterricht an der Gryffe High in Houston soll bei Temperaturen stattgefunden haben, die unter den Gesundheits- und Sicherheitsrichtlinien lagen.
en: School holds lessons in cold classrooms after heating breakdown. Classes at Gryffe High in Houston are claimed to have taken place in temperatures below health and safety guidelines.
la: Schola habet lectiones in Integer in frigore post calefactionem naufragii. Classes apud Gryffe Maximum in Houston factas in temperaturis infra sanitatis et salutis normas asserunt.

Aber neue Forschungsergebnisse werfen Fragen auf…

title: Jupiter’s moon Europa may lack key ingredients for life in its subsurface ocean: study
description: Scientists found that Europa’s rocky seafloor is likely too strong to support tectonic or volcanic activity, processes that on Earth provide chemical energy and nutrients essential for life.
content:
Jupiter's moon Europa is
on the short list of places in our solar system seen as
promising in the search for life beyond Earth, with a large
subsurface ocean thought to be hidden under an outer sh… [+4546 chars]
de: Dem Jupitermond Europa fehlen möglicherweise wichtige Zutaten für das Leben in seinem unterirdischen Ozean: Studie. Wissenschaftler fanden heraus, dass der felsige Meeresboden Europas wahrscheinlich zu stark ist, um tektonische oder vulkanische Aktivitäten zu unterstützen, Prozesse, die auf der Erde chemische Energie und lebenswichtige Nährstoffe liefern.
en: Jupiter’s moon Europa may lack key ingredients for life in its subsurface ocean: study. Scientists found that Europa’s rocky seafloor is likely too strong to support tectonic or volcanic activity, processes that on Earth provide chemical energy and nutrients essential for life.
la: Iovis Luna Europa ingredientia clavis ad vitam carere potest in suo subsurfaciente oceano: studio. Scientistae invenerunt Europam maritimam scopulosam esse verisimile nimis validum esse ad actionem tectonicam vel volcanicam sustinendam, processus qui in Terra provideant energiam chemicas et nutrimenta pro vita necessaria.

title: Early hominins from Morocco basal to the Homo sapiens lineage
description: New hominin fossils from the Grotte à Hominidés at Thomas Quarry I (ThI-GH) in Casablanca, Morocco, dated to around 773 thousand years ago are similar in age to Homo antecessor, yet are morphologically distinct.
content:
Excavation methods
ThI-GH SU4 and SU5 have been systematically excavated since 1994. A 0.5/1-m-deep sequence of an area of 48m2 was excavated (Fig. 3a and Extended Data Fig. 1b). Excavation was perf… [+20552 chars]
de: Frühe Homininen aus Marokko, basal bis zur Abstammungslinie des Homo sapiens. Neue Hominin-Fossilien aus der Grotte à Hominidés im Thomas-Steinbruch I (ThI-GH) in Casablanca, Marokko, die auf etwa 773.000 Jahre datiert werden, ähneln im Alter dem Homo antecessor, sind jedoch morphologisch unterschiedlich.
en: Early hominins from Morocco basal to the Homo sapiens lineage. New hominin fossils from the Grotte à Hominidés at Thomas Quarry I (ThI-GH) in Casablanca, Morocco, dated to around 773 thousand years ago are similar in age to Homo antecessor, yet are morphologically distinct.
la: Early hominins from Morocco basal to the Homo sapiens genus. Novi homininum fossilium a Grotte à Hominidés apud Thomam Quarry I (ThI-GH) in Casablanca, Mauritania, ad mille circiter annos DCCLXXIII data, homini antecessori similes sunt, morphologice tamen distinctae sunt.

title: RNA-triggered Cas12a3 cleaves tRNA tails to execute bacterial immunity
description: Cas12a3 nucleases constitute a distinct clade of type V CRISPR–Cas bacterial immune systems that preferentially cleave the 3′ tails of tRNAs after recognition of target RNA to induce growth arrest and block phage dissemination.
content:
Orthologue identification, phylogenetic analysis and sequence alignment
We used previously identified Cas12a2 protein sequences27 as queries for tBLASTn and BLASTp searches in the NCBI databases (ht… [+43488 chars]
de: Durch RNA ausgelöstes Cas12a3 spaltet tRNA-Schwänze, um eine bakterielle Immunität auszulösen. Cas12a3-Nukleasen stellen eine bestimmte Gruppe bakterieller Immunsysteme vom Typ V CRISPR-Cas dar, die nach Erkennung der Ziel-RNA bevorzugt die 3′-Schwänze von tRNAs spalten, um einen Wachstumsstopp herbeizuführen und die Phagenverbreitung zu blockieren.
en: RNA-triggered Cas12a3 cleaves tRNA tails to execute bacterial immunity. Cas12a3 nucleases constitute a distinct clade of type V CRISPR–Cas bacterial immune systems that preferentially cleave the 3′ tails of tRNAs after recognition of target RNA to induce growth arrest and block phage dissemination.
la: RNA Urguet Cas12a3 adhaeret trNA caudae ad immunitatem bacterial exequendam. Cas12a3 nucleases insignem cladem generis V CRISPR-cas systemata bacterial immunes quae potius 3′ caudis trNAs cohaerent, post agnitionem scopum RNA ad incrementum capiendum et obstructum disseminationem inducendam.

title: Pulse heating and slip enhance charging of phase-change thermal batteries
description: A strategy based on the design of a composite coating that enables slip-enhanced close-contact melting inside sealed phase-change thermal batteries to improve charging rates enables high-performance thermal energy storage over a wide range of temperatures.
content:
• Chu, S. & Majumdar, A. Opportunities and challenges for a sustainable energy future. Nature488, 294303 (2012). Article  ADS  PubMed  Google Scholar 
  • Saher, S. et al. Trimodal … [+11383 chars]
de: Impulserwärmung und schlupfverbesserndes Laden von Phasenwechsel-Thermobatterien. Eine Strategie, die auf dem Design einer Verbundbeschichtung basiert, die ein schlupfverstärktes Schmelzen bei engem Kontakt in versiegelten Phasenwechsel-Thermobatterien ermöglicht, um die Laderaten zu verbessern, ermöglicht eine leistungsstarke thermische Energiespeicherung über einen weiten Temperaturbereich.
en: Pulse heating and slip enhance charging of phase-change thermal batteries. A strategy based on the design of a composite coating that enables slip-enhanced close-contact melting inside sealed phase-change thermal batteries to improve charging rates enables high-performance thermal energy storage over a wide range of temperatures.
la: Pulsus calefactio et lapsus augendae invectionis phase-mutationis gravida scelerisque. A consilio substructio in consilio tunicae compositae quae efficit lapsus-contactus prope-contactus liquescens intus obsignato phase-mutatione scelerisque gravida ut emendare praecipiens rates dat summus industriae energiae scelerisque in amplis temperaturis reposita.

title: Snow forces flight cancellations in Paris, Amsterdam
description: Around 140 flights were cancelled at Paris's Charles de Gaulle airport this morning because of snowfall and fierce cold, and a further 40 were cancelled at Orly airport, France's transport minister said.
content: Around 140 flights were cancelled at Paris's Charles de Gaulle airport this morning because of snowfall and fierce cold, and a further 40 were cancelled at Orly airport, France's transport minister s… [+2432 chars]
de: Schnee führt zu Flugausfällen in Paris und Amsterdam. Rund 140 Flüge wurden heute Morgen am Pariser Flughafen Charles de Gaulle aufgrund von Schneefall und großer Kälte gestrichen, und weitere 40 wurden am Flughafen Orly gestrichen, sagte der französische Verkehrsminister.
en: Snow forces flight cancellations in Paris, Amsterdam. Around 140 flights were cancelled at Paris's Charles de Gaulle airport this morning because of snowfall and fierce cold, and a further 40 were cancelled at Orly airport, France's transport minister said.
la: Nivis copiae cancellationes in fuga Lutetiae, Amstelodami. Circa 140 volatus aeroportus Caroli de Gaulle hoc mane ob nix et frigoris asperi apud Parisios cassati sunt, et amplius 40 in aeriportu Orly aeroportus Franciae minister onerariis cassatis dixit.

title: How cold is too cold to go to work?
description: Employers have responsibilities to keep their workers safe and healthy, particularly when staff have to carry out their duties in cold environments.
content:
The UK is braced for more heavy snow and strong winds as the first named storm of the year sweeps in. 
But what are the rights of staff who have to work in cold conditions?
Sky News looks at the ru… [+2778 chars]
de: Wie kalt ist zu kalt, um zur Arbeit zu gehen? Arbeitgeber haben die Verantwortung, für die Sicherheit und Gesundheit ihrer Arbeitnehmer zu sorgen, insbesondere wenn die Mitarbeiter ihre Aufgaben in kalten Umgebungen ausführen müssen.
en: How cold is too cold to go to work?. Employers have responsibilities to keep their workers safe and healthy, particularly when staff have to carry out their duties in cold environments.
la: Quam frigus est nimium frigus ad operandum. Officia habent operarii ut suos operarios salvos et sanos conservent, praesertim cum baculus officium suum in frigidis ambitibus exerceat.

en: I eat 2 pounds of raw meat a day, including ground chuck and steak — it led to a bizarre, antibiotic-resistant infection. "I love ripping the flesh straight off the bone," Wendy Marshall declared on "My Strange Addiction."

title: Government-sponsored awards and the cold shoulder abroad: What the Israeli film industry can expect in 2026
description: This year, the Israeli movie industry will likely continue to feel the effects of its extreme government's actions both at home and abroad. Meanwhile, Netflix and the Saudis flex their muscles internationally
content: As Nostradamus' mother no doubt warned her son, only a fool enters the predictions game. Which is why I feel well qualified to make the following pronouncements about what lies ahead in 2026.
de: Von der Regierung gesponserte Auszeichnungen und die kalte Schulter im Ausland: Was die israelische Filmindustrie im Jahr 2026 erwarten kann. In diesem Jahr wird die israelische Filmindustrie wahrscheinlich weiterhin die Auswirkungen der Maßnahmen ihrer extremen Regierung im In- und Ausland spüren. Unterdessen lassen Netflix und die Saudis international ihre Muskeln spielen
en: Government-sponsored awards and the cold shoulder abroad: What the Israeli film industry can expect in 2026. This year, the Israeli movie industry will likely continue to feel the effects of its extreme government's actions both at home and abroad. Meanwhile, Netflix and the Saudis flex their muscles internationally
la: Praemia gubernatio-sponsoria et foris umerus frigidus: Quae industria cinematographica Israelis anno 2026. Exspectare potest, hoc anno industria pellicula Israelis effecta extremae gubernationis actiones tam domi quam foris sentire verisimile erit. Interea Netflix et Saudis musculos internationaliter flectunt

title: Forget India’s cold wave: Which place holds the record for the coldest temperatures on Earth?

Antarctica's Vostok Station holds the official record at -89.2°C, while Siberia's Oymyakon is the coldest inhabited city. These frozen frontiers showcase E…

Statio Antarctica in -89.2°C officialem tenet, cum Oymyakon Siberiae frigidissima est urbs habitata. Fines gelidae haec showcase E…

title: Hundreds of flights cancelled, trains delayed and traffic jams as heavy snow hits Europe
description: More flights will be cancelled, trains will run late and roads will be blocked by snow across Europe in coming days as a cold snap is expected to worsen, bringing even more heavy snowfall after several days of travel disruption.
content: More flights will be cancelled, trains will run late and roads will be blocked by snow across Europe in coming days as a cold snap is expected to worsen, bringing even more heavy snowfall after sever… [+2667 chars]
de: Hunderte von Flügen wurden gestrichen, Züge verspäteten sich und es kam zu Staus, da starker Schneefall Europa heimsuchte. In den kommenden Tagen werden in ganz Europa weitere Flüge gestrichen, Züge verspätet fahren und Straßen durch Schnee blockiert werden, da sich die Kältewelle voraussichtlich verschlimmern wird und es nach mehreren Tagen der Reiseunterbrechung noch stärker schneien wird.
en: Hundreds of flights cancelled, trains delayed and traffic jams as heavy snow hits Europe. More flights will be cancelled, trains will run late and roads will be blocked by snow across Europe in coming days as a cold snap is expected to worsen, bringing even more heavy snowfall after several days of travel disruption.
la: Centum volatus cancellatam impedimenta morabantur et negotiatio impedit quam gravis nix Europam ferit. Plures volatus delebuntur, impedimenta sero current et viae nivibus trans Europam claudentur in adventu dierum sicut frangeretur frigus exspectatur peior fieri, nix etiam graviora post aliquot dies discidium iter afferens.
